text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
Every time she watched the Derby,<n>her desire grew. Every
time she<n>watched the Derby, her dream took<n>shape.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
Those all-important emotions became<n>her express ticket to
victory.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text: She proved worthy of her<n>nameâ€”Winning Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
Fans forever chant for the racer who<n>ran with passion for
the Derby, and<n>the wonderful story she wove<n>together
with her rivals.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
Her story will never unravel, but<n>instead will be spun into
new, fantastic<n>tales for years to come.
